thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Egypt's Global Telecom Posts Q4 Consol Loss

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Egypt's Global Telecom Posts Q4 Consol Loss
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - GLOBAL TELECOM HOLDING:
* Q4 LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS $133 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT OF $7 MILLION YEAR AGO
* Q4 TOTAL REVENUE $724 MILLION VERSUS $768 MILLION YEAR AGO
* CUSTOMER GROWTH OF 1.6 PERCENT YEAR-ON-YEAR‍​
* FY CONSOL NET LOSS AFTER TAX $42 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT OF $194 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY CONSOL REVENUE $3.02 BILLION VERSUS $2.96 BILLION YEAR AGO‍​ Source: ( bit.ly/2CCEjNI ) Further company coverage:
